full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHER SNYING GI BZLOG BSGYUR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,'DI LTAR RNAM RTOG GIS BTAGS PA'I GNOD PA RIGS BZLOG PA'I RGYAL PO YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I RGYAL SRID KYI BLON PO RIN PO CHE, @017B TSE RIG PA NI STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BCHING GIS RIGS LAS BYUNG BA, JANG JONG CHEN PO CHEN WANG GI SRAS LNGA PA BSTAN SRID KYI RIG PA DANG LDAN PA, RGYAL MTSAN RDO RJE AER KHE AAS HAS DANG, GA SO RTZIS RIG PA'I BLO GROS RGYAS PA AA CHI THU TAR HAN THO YON CHOS RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA'ANG, NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU, KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI BRAN DU KHOL @018A *, ,BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, ,SA SKYA PAn CHEN GYI LAS TSOGS LA BRTEN NAS BSGRIGS PAR BGYIS PA 'DIR DGE BA YOD NA, DE YIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU'I SKU TSE'I RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PA DANG, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG BSKUL BA PO SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHYI NANG GI BGEGS DANG BRAL NAS, PHAN PA DANG BDE BA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
